channel.title: pathogenicus, Author at Pathogenicus Work
channel.description: Blood and shadow grimoire addressed to me and for my use.

item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
Nestled far away in a dangerous and boding forest, illuminated by the pale moonlight, was the isolated habitation of a sinister magician. The air around it crackled with dark energy, the atmosphere was rank with malevolent power, and unsettling spiritual energy suffused its entire surrounding. There wasn’t much more than a creature in the desolate […]

The post 3 appeared first on Pathogenicus Work.

item.title: Chronicle of stories
item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
The chronicle serves as the structure that binds all the elements and offers the essential context in which you interpret narrative synthesis. Incorporating significant performance influences facilitates the infusion of the overarching story with a particular style and enhances the coherence of the narrative. The period between adventures provides a generalized representation of the world […]

The post Chronicle of stories appeared first on Pathogenicus Work.

item.title: Beginning start
item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
Adventure pollenating involves generating synthesized associations and expanding upon them to establish a preliminary set of potential storylines and character weavings, which I will call a story network and character technique mechanism systemizing. I can employ sporing at the beginning of a chronicle or even later on, and it is particularly useful when I excel […]

item.title: _zero
item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
For now, we are here. A (g)host story of spiritual performance. so here I must transition to shade management – let’s look at one’s own and become another I say, yes, FORSAKE you and me, we are the same as one the end is now upon us; that is, me and my shadow. the two of […]
